writings.text: 相撲に勝って勝負に負ける

readings.text: すもうにかってしょうぶにまける

furigana.writing: 相撲に勝って勝負に負ける
furigana.reading: すもうにかってしょうぶにまける

glossary: to fail at the last moment
to have the upper hand in sumo (technique) but lose the match
to ultimately fail despite being in a favourable position
to win the battle but lose the war
